sync.sessionNotFound: Amazon session not found. Please log in.
sync.completed: Kindle highlights sync completed. Imported {{bookCount}} books and {{highlightCount}} highlights.
sync.templateError: Template Error for "{{bookTitle}}": {{errorMessage}}. Skipping this book.
sync.fileProcessingError: Error processing file: {{filePath}}. File object not found.

outputDirectory.name: Output Directory
outputDirectory.description: Directory where highlights will be saved

noteTemplate.title: Note Template
noteTemplate.description: Edit your template below (uses Nunjucks syntax). See Nunjucks documentation for details. Click on a variable to insert it into the template.

variables.title: Available Variables
variables.highlightsCount: Number of highlights in the book

amazonRegion.name: Amazon Region
amazonRegion.invalidRegionError: Invalid Amazon region selected: {{value}}. Reverting to default.

downloadMetadata.name: Download Metadata
downloadMetadata.description: Download book metadata (cover, publication date, etc.)

errors.cannotInitiate: Error: Cannot initiate login. Invalid Amazon region configuration or Electron components unavailable.

amazonLogout.title: Amazon Logout Confirmation
amazonLogout.confirmationText: Are you sure you want to log out from your Amazon Kindle session within Obsidian?
amazonLogout.noteText: Note: This attempts to clear the session. You may need to log in again next time.
